comment.author: 92033577@N00
comment._content:
How about a clue to the mechanics ?   :-)
Lovely thing!

comment.author: 26491575@N05
comment._content: Thanks for the question. This whimsical calendar is currently on display at the Library Company in the exhibition "Remnants of Everyday Life: Historical Ephemera in the Workplace, Street and Home," May 13-December 13, 2013. The mechanics work through the "knobs". Top knob controls the day of the week; middle knob controls the date of the month; and the bottom controls the name of the month. I hope this clarifies how this great little piece works.

comment.author: 92033577@N00
comment._content: It does, thanks!  Wouldn't it be fun if someone made these again today, as an alternative to online calendars?
